required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical and Electrographic Changes in Responsive Neurostimulation System (RNS) Patients With Acupuncture Treatment
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical and Electrographic Changes in RNS System Patients With Acupuncture Treatment

lead_sponsor.agency: The University of Texas Health Science Center, Houston

clinical_study.source: The University of Texas Health Science Center, Houston

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine effects of Acupuncture on a Patient's mood and cognition,evaluate changes in clinically-reported seizure frequency and severity and analyze effects of Acupuncture on electrographic epileptiform activity stored by the RNS System

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change in number of disabling clinical seizures
primary_outcome.description: This will be measured by self reporting journals
This will be measured by self reporting journals

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in cognition and mood as assessed by the Quality Of Life In Epilepsy (QOLIE-10) questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: This is a 10 item questionnaire. Score ranges from 1-6,a higher number indicating a worse outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in cognition and mood as assessed by the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9)
secondary_outcome.description: PHQ-9 score can range from 0 to 27,each of the 9 items can be scored from 0 (not at all) to 3 (nearly every day).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in cognition and mood as assessed by the Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7-item (GAD-7) scale
secondary_outcome.description: This is a 7 item questionnaire. Each question is scored form 0(not at alll) to 3(nearly every day)

secondary_outcome.measure: Average number of detections of seizures per-day (as stored by the RNS System)
Average number of detections of seizures per-day (as stored by the RNS System)
Average number of detections of seizures per-day (as stored by the RNS System)
Average number of detections of seizures per-day (as stored by the RNS System)
Average number of detections of seizures per-day (as stored by the RNS System)

intervention.description: Participants will undergo 12 weeks of acupuncture therapy. There will be one 40 minute-1 hour. session per week.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient implanted with the RNS system
- Patient can undergo 12 weeks of acupuncture
- Patient is able remain on stable medications for 12 weeks
- Patient is able to remain on stable Detection and Stimulation settings for 12 weeks
- Patient or/and caregiver is able to understand and sign informed consent and HIPAA authorization
- Patient or caregiver able to maintain a seizure diary for duration of study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient and /or caregiver is unable to sign informed consent to study
- Patient has a bleeding disorder, pacemaker, or pregnant

overall_official.affiliation: The University of Texas Health Science Center, Houston

facility.name: The University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The University of Texas Health Science Center, Houston
